Introduction

Han Dong Geun is a South Korean ballad singer currently under Brand New Music. He was the winner of MBC's Star Audition 3 and debuted on September 30, 2014 with the single "Making A New Ending For This Story".
On December 20, 2019, it was announced that his exclusive contract has expired with Pledis has expired. They released a statement declaring that they came to a mutual agreement to go their separate ways.

On December 26, 2019, it was announced that he had signed with Brand New Music after previously leaving Pledis.
